item.title: 数据库常用操作笔记
item.description: GreenPlum/PostGreSQL操作 Create a new database: createdb medb Drop database: dropdb medb Access database: psql -h gpserver -d gpdatabase -U gpuser -W Get help: medb=# \h Quit: medb=# \q Read command from file: medb=# \i input.sql To dump a database: pg_dump medb > db.out To reload the database: psql -d database -f db.out Dump all database: pg_dumpall > /var/lib/pgsql/backups/dumpall.sql Restore database: psql -f /var/lib/pgsql/backups/dumpall.sql medb Show databases: psql -l medb=# \l; Show users: medb=# select * from "pg_user"; Show tables: medb=# select * from "pg_tables"; Set password: medb=# upadte pg_shadow set passwd = 'new_password' where usename = 'username'; Clean all databases (Should be done via a daily cron): vacuumdb --quiet --all check column of table medb=# select * from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.
